input_args.text: "And the niggers and libtards thought that putting body cameras on LEOs were going to uncover a treasure trove of evidence in order to convict every cop in the US on racist brutality charges. The exact opposite has happened as the niggers' obsessively aggressive behavior is now on full display on JewTube and elsewhere for all the world to witness. Also, the cops are nearly always shown using kit glove tactic in order to wrangle these beasts. This video is a perfect example of why females should not be allowed in law enforcement as at a minimum a taser should have been used on this ape the second it stepped towards her with a bat."
